node_modules/pimatic-pilight/pilight-config-shema.coffee

pilight configuration options

Defines a node-convict config-shema and exports it.

module.exports = host: doc: "The ip or host to connect to the piligt-daemon" format: String default: "127.0.0.1" port: doc: "port to connect to the piligt-daemon" format: "port" default: 5000
